name: Trello-powered WP Forms, Form builder, SMTP, Emails by Hipporello
author: Hipporello

sections.description:
Hipporello offers a comprehensive suite of forms tailored for a wide array of needs, from capturing contact requests and gathering specific information to collecting feedback, processing orders, and event registrations on your WordPress site. These forms integrate with Trello, making it easy to manage and track submissions. With the drag-and-drop form builder, you can create custom forms and embed them into your WP site. The easy-to-use interface simplifies the design process, allowing you to gather structured data.
In addition to collecting form submissions, Hipporello extends its functionality to ensure better communication between you and your form submitters. You can engage in email communication directly from Trello following a submission. This is made possible through Hipporello’s built-in SMTP support, ensuring easy and reliable delivery of your messages. For any questions, do not hesitate to contact our dedicated support team by starting live chat through our website.

Seamless Trello integration

Hipporello forms seamlessly integrate with Trello. Each form submission creates a new card in your Trello board allowing for easy management, storage and tracking of submissions.

Emailing Form Submitters

Hipporello’s built in email system allows you to send email messages to those who submit forms from inside Trello. This popular feature ensures no submission gets missed and all submissions and communication can be seen in the same platform easily.

User-Friendly Design for Everyone

Hipporello offers an all-in-one form solution for users of all skill levels and it ensures that creating and customizing forms is straightforward, even for complete beginners. The Hipporello team is ready to help with setup and the basics to speed up your onboarding.

Design Visually Appealing Forms with Ease

You can empower your WordPress site with beautifully designed forms that require no design expertise. Our intuitive interface lets you create forms that captivate and engage your audience without any design background.

Advanced Capabilities Without a Developer

Create forms choosing form fields from a great variety, embed easily, automate emails and store all responses in an organized manner in Trello. This gives you the power to create and embed complex forms that meet your specific needs without the need for coding knowledge.

Kickstart with Pre-Designed Templates

Speed up form creation using our library of pre-built templates. Whether for registrations, appointments, or feedback, get a head start and customize to fit your brand perfectly.

Mobile Responsive Forms

Guarantee a seamless viewing experience on any device. Our forms are designed to be mobile-responsive and complement the aesthetic of your WordPress theme beautifully.

Intuitive Drag-and-Drop Form Builder

Experience the ultimate convenience with a drag-and-drop builder that makes form creation a breeze. Design complex forms in minutes, with no technical skills required. Edit any time easily.

Conditional Logic for Personalized Forms

Implement conditional logic to create dynamic forms that adapt based on user responses, providing a personalized and efficient form-filling experience for your website visitors. This also allows you to collect every detail that you need without missing anything.

Instant Alert Notifications

Hipporello notifies you of each new form submission. This allows you to stay promptly informed whenever a form is submitted, enabling you to react quickly to inquiries, orders, or any form responses.

20+ field types

Collect as much data as you need from your website visitors using the great variety of form fields. Choose from name, website, contact info, attachments, captcha and more.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/hipporello-form-viewer directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
How to embed a form in WordPress using Hipporello?

  • Install Hipporello’s Service Desk
  • Go to Admin Panel > Forms. Edit a template or create a form from scratch.
  • Go to form embed and copy embed code as instructed for WordPress.

How to add contact form in WordPress?

  • Install Hipporello’s Service Desk
  • Go to Admin Panel > Forms. Edit the Contact form template and save it.
  • Go to form embed and copy embed code as instructed for WordPress.

How to add captcha to WordPress contact form?

  • Install Hipporello’s Service Desk
  • Go to Admin Panel > Forms. Click on Contact form to edit it.
  • Choose captcha from the form elements list on the right hand side. Save.
  • Go to form embed and copy embed code as instructed for WordPress.

Can I send emails with Hipporello forms?

Yes, you can send as many emails as you wish. You can also define automated messages to send confirmation emails to those that contact you through forms. It’s possible to decide what email address you’d like your emails to be sent from. This way, you get a shared inbox to manage form submissions and you can collaborate with your team members on that.

Who should use Hipporello forms?

Hipporello Forms is ideal for WordPress users at any skill level. Whether you’re looking for a contact form, planning on collecting feedback, trying to find easy-to-use form templates, or automating emails to form submissions, you’re equipped with the necessary tools. Hipporello Forms is the versatile drag-and-drop WordPress form builder designed to empower you to create the tailored WordPress forms your projects demand. It simplifies form creation with its intuitive drag-and-drop interface, making professional form design accessible to all. If you find it hard to get started, we have a dedicated support team ready to help waiting for you to start live chat through our website.
